info.brief_description: You find yourself living two lives, changing between them when asleep. How will you cope?
info.description:
One night when you go to sleep you find yourself living the life of someone else. When you go to sleep as them, you are back in your original life. When occupying the other body you are living through the same day you just experienced in your body. (if a day has not occurred before you go to sleep again, another change does not occur until a day has passed.)

Your name is Jacob Wermerand you are 18 years old with al older sister Katrina, your best friends Halima Mussari and Morgan Neeps.

Basic Rules:
1. Don't kill the main character in either life
2. No personality changes
3. Keep events chronologically consistent. (If something happens in the 1st life, it can't be stopped from happening in the 2nd life)
4. Don't end the story
5. You can only speak languages whatever body you are in is able to speak (not all choices will be able to speak english)
6. They only get 2 'lives' to live

Feel free to add chapters, characters and as always... HAVE FUN!
